channel.title: Blog on Hi, I'm Andy
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Hi, I'm Andy

item.title: Creating a Geodemographic Classification in R
item.description: A geodemographic classification for marketing purposes. Geodemographic classifications are basically a way of geographically grouping similar people based on their demographics. You may have heard that “birds of a feather, flock together” meaning that similar people with similar demographics are likely to live in close proximity to each other.

item.title: Tracking movement behavior during a pandemic
item.description: At the time of writing, its been just over four months since coronavirus came to the UK. While it seems like things are returning to some degree of normality - social distance permitting - the influence of the pandemic has no doubt changed the way we live, work and interact in society.
